modShortDescription: Removes the need for specific parts for items (weapon parts, gun parts, armor parts). Increases amount of steel/iron ingots needed for crafting said items.
modDescription:
This mod does a couple of things:

1. Removes the need for specific parts for items ([weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) parts, gun parts, armor parts)
2. Increases amount of steel/iron ingots needed for crafting said items
3. Removes armor/gun/weapon parts from loot pool (hopefully)

It actually sets the parts requirements to 0, so they still appear in crafting requirements but with 0 count.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-g_9VT6LMdmqBBUklj9Qlaf4nqnV72Bm/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** [Jeo](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jeo/)
